meanings.definition: A whimsical or fanciful object or contraption.
meanings.sent1: The children played with a colorful whigmaleerie in the park.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate whigmaleerie displayed in the shop window.
meanings.sent3: The whigmaleerie made everyone smile with its quirky design.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with whigmaleeries that seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: The artist's whigmaleerie creations were truly one-of-a-kind.

meanings.sent1: His dream of flying without wings was a delightful whigmaleerie.
meanings.sent2: She often got lost in the whigmaleerie of her imagination.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog was a funny whigmaleerie to ponder.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the concept of time was a mysterious whigmaleerie.
meanings.sent5: The whigmaleerie of traveling to space fascinated him endlessly.
